overview:
Jalin works at Google and, independently of Google, mentors startups.

He is Head of Special Projects for N & C Europe at Google and has held previous roles as a Project Leader in Sales Strategy for Google’s EMEA Display ads business and as head of EMEA consumer marketing for Chrome and for Search. Prior to Google, he spent six years as a strategy consultant.

Unrelated to Google: he is a mentor with (leading European accelerator) Seedcamp and has given talks on ‘Customer Acquisition Beyond SEO and SEM’ to groups of startups from Seedcamp, the Startup Leadership Program and Launch48. He is also a non-executive director and investor in Bluefields.com.

funding_round.source_description: Bluefields Scores Angel Funding To Help Amateur Football Teams Get Organised
